Write-Up Text: People on social media are speaking up about the need for an increase in JobSeeker payments ahead of the federal budget. Labor backbenchers are pushing for change while organizations such as the St Vincent de Paul Society are urging the Prime Minister to deliver a substantial increase to JobSeeker and Youth Allowance. Concerns have also been raised about the impact of allowing 60-day prescription dispensing on local pharmacies and patient safety. The language used on social media ranges from hopeful ('where there's a will there's a way') to skeptical ('I guess any bit of guilt tripping works').
